billhistory.lastaction: 03/30/2017 H Referred to Special Purpose Districts: Mar 30 2017 1:18PM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the powers and duties of the Meyer Ranch Municipal Utility District of Comal County; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes.

subjects.subject: MEYER RANCH MUNICIPAL UTILITY DISTRICT OF COMAL COUNTY (D1422)
Special Districts & Authorities--Municipal Utility Districts (I0009)
Special Districts & Authorities--Water & Utility (I0755)
